content: @Joshua Nelson I was reading pull request #79253. After reading your comment is my understanding correct that the flag you suggest makes the PR unnecessary?
@apiraino it's unclear to me what problem the PR author has, but I would count rustc hello_world.rs giving a sysroot error as a bug
passing --sysroot each and every time seems like a burden
(is this related to wg-prioritization? I don't see I-prioritize)
you're right it's not related to prioritization but it's in the agenda as a "PR waiting on team", I was updating the summary for that issue extracting the right context from your comment
